name: RadiganMedia
0:
”Alexa, open my radio”
”Alexa, ask my radio to play choice one oh two”
”Alexa, ask my radio to play the bridge”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my radio
des: Introducing Radigan Media - the ultimate destination for streaming your favorite radio stations. With our skill, you can listen to all of our stations, including 95.3 The Bridge, Choice 102, Valley 107.7, WEBO, Liberty 960, and many more, with just your voice. Try Radigan Media now and experience the convenience of voice-controlled radio streaming.
